_header: Alack alack what shall I do
Note:
Preceding 5741; see Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 88.
_description: Fragment of a love song — three lines

BLAdd31922.Transcription: Alac alac what shall I doffor care is cast in to my hartAnd trewloue lakked ther to
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notes repeated twice more for further singing parts.
